details: I conducted rigorous software stability reviews for a large fintech company, identifying vulnerabilities and problems in application code/infrastructure, and worked on an AI knowledge graph with Zoom API integration to store client meeting data and help us automate future stability reviews using RAG.

I interned at Microsoft at their HQ in Washington, USA where I created a data visualization package for Microsoft Viva and implemented a new design palette for charting in Fluent UI. I was also apart of the first batch of interns recruited from universities in the Caribbean.
Currently working on GenAI powered educational software solutions for students and teachers. I primarily work on our flagship product EduHub StudySmart and EezyTeach.
I designed and built complete mobile applications and websites for our clients. I also onboarded new developers to existing projects.
Omega Renovation is a home/office renovations and remodelling company based in Ontario, Canada. I created and currently maintain the official company website.
I worked with a skilled team to build high-quality, scalable applications using AWS. I also served as interim UI developer.

company: Google Developer Student Club - UTECH chapter
details: DSC is a community where students can build their technological skills, by exposing them to programming, data analytics, ML etc. I organized and led the club's activities, and also served as lead developer on projects like UTech Explore and 1nReady.

I co-founded and organized the FortesHacks 24-hour student hackathon competition at Campion College in 2020 with over 60 high school participants. I also mentored teams and conducted a workshop on cybersecurity.
